textBeforeTable: The tyre strategies for each driver: Italian Grand Prix tyre strategies Mercedes produced the fastest pit stop of the race for Nico Rosberg. But just as impressive was Red Bull’s stacked pit-stops for Sebastian Vettel and Mark Webber on lap 23, which were among the four fastest stops of the race. Caterham were the only team which opted for a two-stop strategy for their drivers. Kimi Raikkonen and Lewis Hamilton both ended up two-stopping because they were forced to make early pit stops due to damage. As is normal at Monza, one-stop strategies were the order of the day for most drivers. 10 comments Keith Collantine September 8, 2013 at 5:53 pm by 2013 Italian Grand Prix 2013 Italian Grand Prix tyre strategies and pit stops Activity Members Groups All forums
